name: ShapeRockets
description: Three shapes. Two choices. One weapon. ShapeRockets is the worldâ€™s first literal online multiplayer Rock, Paper, Scissors first-person shooter!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: A brilliant and refreshing twist on the FPS genre, especially nice since we have 6 degrees of movement. Dont' let the seemingly simple design fool you, there is a lot of complexity underneath the surface that leads to a lot of challenge and fun. And at this price point you can't go wrong
Ey, game is okey but as far as i can see game is pretty dead, no servers up last I checked (today)
